name: Partisan (itch) (Alex Cooper)
description:
In Partisan you play as, well, Partisan. You were sent on a mission to go defeat some evil beings and reclaim the Sword of Etheral! You go through the dungeon and complete puzzles and use clues as to where the enemies are! 

Now get in there and save your kingdom! They depend on you.

Controls:

  • wasd: movement
  • q: stab enemy
  • e: search for clues

Please note you must stand on the tile you suspect the enemy to be and then stab them. There are also buttons on screen you can use! Have fun!

As far as source code for the game jam: I wrote this in lua, just look in the "/lua/" directory of the game and youll see everything :)
